fields.summary: [VZ_WiFi7][Wi-Fi] Unable to change Wi-Fi security mode to WPA-WPA2-Personal

status.description: Component is released, ready for integration.
status.name: Component Released

fields.summary: SSW Mapper NOK on prpl mainline Safran

status.description: SW with updated config was released
status.name: INTEGRATED

fields.Action:
From the HDM, try to modify the current WiFi Credentials,

Eg:
 * Device.WiFi.SSID.1.SSID tesst24GHz
 * Device.WiFi.SSID.2.SSID tesst5GHz
 * Device.WiFi.AccessPoint.1.Security.KeyPassPhrase 1234567892
 * Device.WiFi.AccessPoint.2.Security.KeyPassPhrase 1234567892
 * Device.WiFi.AccessPoint.1.Security.ModeEnabled WPA-WPA2-Personal
fields.Expected Result:
It should be possible to change the current WiFi Credentials.
	
	New SSID is boradcasted on both bands. (2.4GHz and 5GHz)

fields.Action: Try to connect a WPA-STA to the DUT using the new WiFi settings.
fields.Expected Result: The WPA-STA association succeeds using the new Key.

fields.description:
The test aims to check the ability to Change WiFi credentials (SSID, Key, Encryption) remotely.
	
	NOTE: HDM = ACS

[Precondition]

	DUT already provisioned and connected to Wan.
	Customer Client available.

security.description: Only SoftAtHome people can access the issue
security.name: SAH
